translations: 带纹道的；表面有沟槽的
开出沟槽（groove 的过去分词）

phrs.translation: [机]绳沟滚筒；[机]缠索轮；[机]有槽鼓筒

sentences.sentence: The inscriptions are fresh and deep grooved.
sentences.translation: 题词很新，笔画刻得深深的。

sentences.sentence: There are grooved places for your feet on either side of the toilet.
sentences.translation: 在蹲厕两侧会有那种带纹路的地方是供你的脚踩的。

sentences.sentence: After rain had fallen in the minutes before the start, all the drivers set off on grooved intermediate tyres.
sentences.translation: 由于比赛前几分钟突然开始下雨，所有的车手都更换了中性胎。
